thread.title: M Rafi

author: M Rafi
title: M Rafi
text: Good company but could make it more smoother by taking your vehicle/insurance details and doing a smooth transition...without charging Â£19.99 EXTRA! I went on DVLA site and did it in 5mins. And a quick phone call to my insurance and they sorted it without extra cost. It's a minor change on policy so most don't charge. Other than that regtransfers are a great company.
